data.title: Jenny Wright
data.meta_description: View Jenny Wright's profile on The Dots. Jenny is a Animation Director and Animator currently based in London.
data.text:
Wait 2023Wait, 2023 Come over and eat fondu. The world is looking beautiful. jennywright100@gmail.com instagram: hellojennywright A short animated film made on the Studio Support Programme at TAIS in Toronto Drawn in October 2022 then completed and put online in Jan 2023 Sound & music: Marcus Rice & Matthew Wright Voice of Galway Kinnell: Academy of American Poets Production Centre: Toronto Animated Image Society Thank you to The Literary Estate of Galway Kinnell For the bottle of ink used to make the

Muji Partnership 'It's the simple things' 2023Animated advert / concept development & design / Illustrations for online & in-store use In this partnership I worked with Muji's in-house team to create a concept for their Christmas Campaign, designed and animated a Christmas Advert taking inspiration from their products & redrew still images from the animation to be used in-store across Europe.

Hindsight’s 2020It commemorates the One Year Anniversary of Tomfoolery's original poem 'The Great Realisation'. A bedtime story of how it started, and why hindsight’s 2020.

Food PornSeed has recently collaborated with 15 emerging animators to complete a short film called Food Porn. The film is a compilation of wonderful clips of junk food, snacks and sugary/alcoholic drinks all being far too sexy.
